channel.title: Grunt Factory - Lasers not rotating
channel.description:
https://imgur.com/gallery/TV5LVr1
***hostname: Black Mesa*** ***version : 100001/24 100001 insecure*** ***map : bm_c4a3c at: -7851 x, 1483 y, -12802 z***
***setpos -7851.230469 1483.455811 -12802.468750;setang -24.388691 -94.967720 0.000000***
These are working in other people's games, but haven't triggered in mine. Hope you can help !
EDIT : Restart and Fresh install have not fixed this issue.
